round 1 magic_ring 6 slip_stitch f/o side fins make 2 row 1 chain 6 row 2 2nd from hook single_crochet 5 across chain 1 turn row 3 single_crochet 5 attach orange row 4 single_crochet across and two down the side f/o leave a tail for sewing tail row 1 chain 2 row 2 single_crochet 3 in 2nd from hook do not join turn 3 row 3 increase single_crochet increase 5 row 4 single_crochet 5 5 row 5 increase 3sc increase 7 attach orange row 6 single_crochet around outer edge of tail f/o yellow top fin chain 5 4sc starting 2nd chain from hook do not turn chain 6 5sc starting 2nd chain from hook do not turn chain 5 4sc starting 2nd chain from hook f/o yellow bottom fin chain 4 3sc starting 2nd chain from hook do not turn repeat 2 more times for a total of 3 assembly 1 add pupils with black to each eye and sew one on each side of the body 2 add fins behind each eye on the sides 3 sew on the tail 4 sew on each yellow top and bottom fins 5 add the yellow whisker by knotting pieces of yarn on the
